title: Rank..
body: I was in Bronze V in season 5, and I stopped playing ranked games on season 6. Will my MMR reset when i start playing rank in season 7?

replies.body: Placement matches may  take into account your previous season rankings, but I wouldn't worry about it too much because they vary with each season.  Complete your placement matches for matchmaking to put you in a tier/division, and you can just continue on from there!
